segments.text: I'm struck by the strange dichotomy of this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden looks so calm and well-tended.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a neat path and low bushes, everything in order.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, chaos is slowly taking over this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is such a clear indicator of impending trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just pouring out, soaking the cabinets and the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a waste of water, and it will cause so much damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of cleaning up that mess is already making me cringe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those poor cabinets, getting soaked like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s hard to reconcile the peaceful exterior with the domestic disaster brewing within.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is going to have a very unpleasant surprise soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen will be quite the mess, I fear.
segments.speaker: PAR
